That the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> may <S%H5046>show<s%> us the <S%H1870>way<s%> <S%H834>wherein<s%> we may <S%H1980>walk,<s%> and the <S%H1697>thing<s%> that we may <S%H6213>do.<s%>

Then <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to them, I have <S%H8085>heard<s%> you; <S%H2005>behold,<s%> I will <S%H6419>pray<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> according to your <S%H1697>words;<s%> and it shall <S%H1961>come<s%> to pass, that <S%H3605>whatever<s%> <S%H1697>thing<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H6030>answer<s%> you, I will <S%H5046>declare<s%> it to you; I will <S%H4513>keep<s%> <S%H3808>nothing<s%> <S%H1697><s%> <S%H4513>back<s%> from you.

Then they <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3414>Jeremiah,<s%> The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> be a <S%H571>true<s%> and <S%H539>faithful<s%> <S%H5707>witness<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> us, <S%H518>if<s%> we <S%H6213>do<s%> not <S%H3651>even<s%> according to <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H1697>things<s%> for the <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> shall <S%H7971>send<s%> you to us.

<S%H518>Whether<s%> it be <S%H2896>good,<s%> or <S%H518>whether<s%> it be <S%H7451>evil,<s%> we will <S%H8085>obey<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> our <S%H430>God,<s%> to whom we <S%H7971>send<s%> you; that it may be <S%H2896>well<s%> with us, <S%H3588>when<s%> we <S%H8085>obey<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> our <S%H430>God.<s%>
And it <S%H1961>came<s%> to pass <S%H7093>after<s%> <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H3117>days,<s%> that the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> to <S%H3414>Jeremiah.<s%>

And <S%H559>said<s%> to them, <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> to <S%H834>whom<s%> <S%H413><s%> you <S%H7971>sent<s%> me to <S%H5307>present<s%> your <S%H8467>supplication<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> him;

<S%H518>If<s%> you will still <S%H3427>abide<s%> in <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H776>land,<s%> then will I <S%H1129>build<s%> you, and not <S%H2040>pull<s%> you down, and I will <S%H5193>plant<s%> you, and not <S%H5428>pluck<s%> you up: for I <S%H5162>repent<s%> me of the <S%H7451>evil<s%> that I have <S%H6213>done<s%> to you.

Be not <S%H3372>afraid<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> of <S%H834>whom<s%> <S%H6440><s%> you are <S%H3373>afraid;<s%> be not <S%H3372>afraid<s%> of him, <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> for I am with you to <S%H3467>save<s%> you, and to <S%H5337>deliver<s%> you from his <S%H3027>hand.<s%>
And I will <S%H5414>show<s%> <S%H7356>mercies<s%> to you, that he may have <S%H7355>mercy<s%> on you, and cause you to <S%H7725>return<s%> to your own <S%H127>land.<s%>

But <S%H518>if<s%> you <S%H559>say,<s%> We will not <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H776>land,<s%> <S%H1115>neither<s%> <S%H8085>obey<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%>

<S%H559>Saying,<s%> <S%H3808>No;<s%> but we will <S%H935>go<s%> into the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> we shall <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H4421>war,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H8085>hear<s%> the <S%H6963>sound<s%> of the <S%H7782>trumpet,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> have <S%H7456>hunger<s%> of <S%H3899>bread;<s%> and <S%H8033>there<s%> will we <S%H3427>dwell:<s%>

And <S%H6258>now<s%> <S%H3651>therefore<s%> <S%H8085>hear<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> you <S%H7611>remnant<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah;<s%> <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> <S%H518>If<s%> you <S%H7760>wholly<s%> <S%H7760>set<s%> your <S%H6440>faces<s%> to <S%H935>enter<s%> into <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and <S%H935>go<s%> to <S%H1481>sojourn<s%> <S%H8033>there;<s%>

Then it shall <S%H1961>come<s%> to pass, that the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you <S%H3373>feared,<s%> shall <S%H5381>overtake<s%> you <S%H8033>there<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and the <S%H7458>famine,<s%> <S%H834>whereof<s%> you were <S%H1672>afraid,<s%> shall <S%H1692>follow<s%> <S%H1692>close<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> you <S%H8033>there<s%> in <S%H4714>Egypt;<s%> and <S%H8033>there<s%> you shall <S%H4191>die.<s%>

So shall it be with <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H582>men<s%> that <S%H7760>set<s%> their <S%H6440>faces<s%> to <S%H935>go<s%> <S%H935>into<s%> <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> to <S%H1481>sojourn<s%> <S%H8033>there;<s%> they shall <S%H4191>die<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> by the <S%H7458>famine,<s%> and by the <S%H1698>pestilence:<s%> and <S%H3808>none<s%> of them shall <S%H8300>remain<s%> or <S%H6412>escape<s%> from the <S%H7451>evil<s%> that I will <S%H935>bring<s%> on them.

For <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> As my <S%H639>anger<s%> and my <S%H2534>fury<s%> has been <S%H5413>poured<s%> forth on the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem;<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> shall my <S%H2534>fury<s%> be <S%H5413>poured<s%> forth on you, when you shall <S%H935>enter<s%> <S%H935>into<s%> <S%H4714>Egypt:<s%> and you shall be an <S%H423>execration,<s%> and an <S%H8047>astonishment,<s%> and a <S%H7045>curse,<s%> and a <S%H2781>reproach;<s%> and you shall <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5750>more.<s%>

The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> has <S%H1696>said<s%> <S%H5921>concerning<s%> you, O you <S%H7611>remnant<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah;<s%> <S%H935>Go<s%> you not into <S%H4714>Egypt:<s%> <S%H3045>know<s%> certainly that I have <S%H5749>admonished<s%> you this <S%H3117>day.<s%>

For you <S%H8582>dissembled<s%> in your <S%H5315>hearts,<s%> <S%H3588>when<s%> you <S%H7971>sent<s%> me to the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H6419>Pray<s%> for us to the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> our <S%H430>God;<s%> and according to <S%H3605>all<s%> that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%> shall <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> <S%H5046>declare<s%> to us, and we will <S%H6213>do<s%> it.

And now I have this <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H5046>declared<s%> it to you; but you have not <S%H8085>obeyed<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> nor <S%H3605>any<s%> thing for the <S%H834>which<s%> he has <S%H7971>sent<s%> me to you.

<S%H6258>Now<s%> therefore <S%H3045>know<s%> certainly that you shall <S%H4191>die<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> by the <S%H7458>famine,<s%> and by the <S%H1698>pestilence,<s%> in the <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> you <S%H2654>desire<s%> to <S%H935>go<s%> and to <S%H1481>sojourn.<s%>
